1.Scrape the grill from front
to back.
2.Apply the grill wiper from
top to bottom of the release
sheet.

3.Place the grill wiper on the
back of the lower grill to push
the oil into the grease trough.
4.Wipe the edges of the release
sheet and platen with a grill
cloth at least once every 15m.

5.Wipe the grill tools with a
damp dry wipe and place them
back into the grill organiser.
6.Press the standby switch to
close the platen.
